org.gjt.sp.jedit.syntax

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gjt.sp.jedit.syntax.Token
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chunk

    public class Token
extends java.lang.Object
    A linked list of syntax tokens.

        length - The length of the token
